graph.knn

Class KNNGraph

  • java.lang.Object
    • graph.basic.DMGraph
      • graph.knn.KNNGraph

  • public class KNNGraph
extends DMGraph
    This class models the KNN graph on the specified DataSet for the specified metric. An edge (x,y) exists if y is in a k-NN list of x.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class graph.basic.DMGraph

        edges, networkDescription, networkName, vertices, visGraph

        public KNNGraph(java.lang.String networkName,
        java.lang.String networkDescription,
        DataSet vertices,
        CombinedMetric cmet)
        Initialization.
        Parameters:
        networkName - String that is the graph name.
        networkDescription - String that is the graph description.
        vertices - DataSet that holds the vertex information. This is where the kNN graph will be derived from.
        cmet - CombinedMetric object for distance calculations.

        java.lang.String networkDescription,
        DataSet vertices,
        DMGraphEdge[] edges)
        Initialization.
        Parameters:
        networkName - String that is the graph name.
        networkDescription - String that is the graph description.
        vertices - DataSet that holds the vertex information. This is where the kNN graph will be derived from.
        edges - DMGraphEdge[] of edges of the graph, in case they have already been calculated.
